statements: SELECT id, username, email FROM data_masking_table;
SELECT * FROM data_masking_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email, username, credit_card_number FROM data_masking_table WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM data_masking_table WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT id, password_hash FROM data_masking_table ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM data_masking_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_masking_table WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT id, username, credit_card_number FROM data_masking_table WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT email, username, password_hash FROM data_masking_table WHERE credit_card_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM data_masking_table WHERE id IN (3, 5) OR username = 'example_username';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 3;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT id, name, email FROM table1;
SELECT * FROM table2 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, address FROM table2 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM table3 WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM table1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, phone_number, address FROM table2 WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM table3 WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM table3 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') = '1990-04-15';
SELECT name, credit_card_number FROM table1 JOIN table2 ON table1.id = table2.id;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT city, state FROM address WHERE zip_code = '12345';
SELECT payment_date, masked_card_number FROM payment WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM order WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM order ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer.full_name, address.street_address, address.city FROM customer JOIN address ON customer.id = address.customer_id;
SELECT customer.full_name, payment.payment_date, payment.masked_card_number FROM customer JOIN payment ON customer.id = payment.customer_id WHERE payment.masked_cvv = '123';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, in_stock FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, payment_method FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, in_stock FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND unit_price > 100.00 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department, salary FROM employees WHERE salary >= 50000.00 ORDER BY department, employee_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount, payment_method FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
